title: Tales of the Old Testament
description: Dramatic retellings of your favorite Bible stories like Jonah and the Whale and the Judgement of Solomon.
quote: Look out, Jonah! It’s a whale!
altHero: a huge whale opens its mouth to swallow a man in a boat
alt1: a fisherman in shock as a whale swims away from a destroyed boat
alt2: a fisherman’s severed head is splattered against the screen with cartoonish blood
alt3: King Solomon stands over a cradle as two women and other people watch
alt4: Solomon raises a sword above the cradle
